title: GJB canteen is serving fresh veg burgers and puffs wrapped inside plastic wrapper and guarded by 3 German cockroaches. HINT:- 2 of them are camera-shy so hiding behind the puffs

comments.body: It is gourmet food hence it has german ingredients
Last time I was there, I saw a baby cockroach coming out of a pizza

Why isnt anyone taking any action canteens which serves 100s of students daily are lacking hygiene standards and no one is taking any action 
Where is the fucking student council ü§°
The 2nd shop be block shop from the right,
13th floor cafeteria,
Bengaluru kitchen,
Gjb food court

My theory is the bugs and the roaches must be plotting something beyond human comprehension. 
The bugs that you're currently noticing might be bait and distraction to something massive. They might be working in secret with the govt. Wait a min.... üßê

https://preview.redd.it/aco5oh1meere1.jpeg?width=344&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=c6bb225d2cd26ac1ecabb381ecda75012d3944ec

They are annoyed that they are getting papped.
Please raise this issue to the dean..
Y'all really need to raise this with the management and not just display the protein options here on reddit. Karma farming won't solve the issue.
You guys still eat from gjb canteen?üéÉ
